🎨 Color Scheme Generator: AI-Powered Color Palettes at Your Fingertips!

Looking for the perfect color scheme for your design? Our Color Scheme Generator Chrome extension uses advanced AI to create beautiful, custom color palettes based on your prompt – all within a simple popup window. Perfect for designers, marketers, and creatives of all kinds!

🚀 How It Works:
Enter a prompt in the popup window.
Let AI generate a color palette based on your description.
Preview and adjust the colors to match your design vision.
🛠️ Key Features:
AI-Powered Palettes: Get unique color combinations with just a few words.
Instant Access: Open the extension with one click from your browser toolbar.
Tailored Designs: Whether it’s for a website, logo, or app, our tool fits any project!
Live Preview: See the color scheme in real-time as it's generated.
Save & Copy: Easily save your favorite color schemes or copy color codes for your designs.
✨ Why Choose Color Scheme Generator?
⏱️ Save Time: No more guessing! Get the perfect color scheme in seconds.
🌈 Creative Flexibility: Perfect for any project – websites, logos, graphics, or apps.
🎨 Easy to Use: No design experience needed. AI handles the hard work for you!
🖌️ Ready to level up your design? Try Color Scheme Generator today and instantly find the perfect color palette for your next project!

This is a must-have tool for anyone who wants quick, AI-generated color schemes, whether you’re a beginner or an expert designer. Get started now!
